titleStmt.title: Preston, Novemb. 17. 1646. The deliberate resolution of the ministers of the the Gospel within the county palatine of Lancaster with their grounds and cautions according to which they put into execution the Presbyteriall government upon the present ordinances of Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Luke Favvne, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls-Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 14th 1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls-Church-yard
